channel.title: MonstergamingUnderground 24/7 Cracked Creative
channel.description:
Monster Gaming Underground Now has a CRACKED minecraft server online! it is a 24/7 server and it is also creative.
NO HAMACHI or any type of VPN powered server! :) Our creative cracked 24/7 minecraft server is really easy to use on ANY cracked minecraft (or even legit) game! (obviously minecraft only).
Our info to connect is:
IP: 94.294.172.230:25565
We currently only support 10 players. I dont think there is any lag but i have not tested this. We are currently in our beta process and if you find anything wrong then please post in the replys below with any other thoughts you have.
http://www.monstergamingunderground.uni.me/index.php?topic=33.msg35#new
I hope this is going to be a big success.
